name: Better Quizlet Dark Theme [V1.8.2]
description: Don't like the official Quizlet dark theme? Use this style! This style corrects a lot of things that are wrong with the official dark theme while also hiding most ads! For optimal use, turn off Quizlet's own dark theme! If you found a problem or want to leave feedback, feel free to do so below!

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about:
Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.

additional_info:
Version 1.8.2
The white backgrounds in Learn are now gone.

Version 1.8.1
Small changes to certain buttons on set pages.
Small buttons are now also dark.

Version 1.8
Changed style name because official dark theme is now free.
Changed style description.
All screens in Learn are dark again.
More white buttons are now dark.
More text at the bottom of set pages is now white.
The Practice test icon on the homepage is now dark.
A lot of smaller text now has a different color.
Fixed some background inconsistencies.
Highlighted or selected items in the side menu now have a dark background.
Big buttons have a new background and a lighter background when you hover over it.
The Upgrade button now matches the new buttons.

Version 1.7.2
Text in toggle-able buttons is now white.
Fixed the border colors of some toggles.
The Require all/one answer buttons now have white text.
Headers in blog posts are white again.
Blog comment timestamps now look normal.
Fixed some link colors on the blog.
Fixed some border and text colors in the Help Center.

Version 1.7.1
The Free Trial notification box is now dark.
Fixed some slightly off-colored backgrounds.
More sections in the Premium content page are now dark.
Drop-down menus are now dark.
Some more blue text now fits with the rest of the dark theme.
The new Help pages are now fully dark.

Version 1.7
The homepage is fully dark again.
Removed a white border on the Press page.
The Quizlet Live info page is now dark.
Sticky navbars are now dark.
The main captcha text is now readable.
The sign-up screen is no longer has white borders.
The topbar on the Guide page is now dark.
Ads between set definitions are now dark.
The Quizlet Live setup page is now fully dark.
Quizlet Live is now dark!

Version 1.6.11
The accents toolbar is now dark again.
The Image toolbar is now dark.
The Group Discount page is now fully dark.
The checkout page is now fully dark.

Version 1.6.10
The Download Android app bar is now dark.
The progress meter on the homepage is now dark.
The highfive counter on the blog is now readable.
The lightest dark colors now match Chrome's dark theme.
The item separators in the user popout are now dark.
The permissions text on the Create page is now white.
The Add image buttons on the Create page now have a dark border.
More icons are now lighter.
Selectors are now properly styled.
Fixed a white border on the Privacy Policy page.
The Spell progress indicators are now dark.
The Print page is fully dark again.

Version 1.6.9
The New set counter next to classes is now white.
Fixed the background of the body to avoid white areas when scrolling. (Thanks for suggesting this Reuben Eggar!)

Version 1.6.8
The mobile version of Match is now fully dark.
When editing a single term/definition on a set's page the text will now be white.

Version 1.6.7
Review text is now fully white.
Scores in Match are readable again.
More stuff on the Premium Content page is dark.
Fixed some borders on the Mobile page.
More stuff on the Teachers page is now dark.
The language selector in the Help Center is now dark.

Version 1.6.6
Icons in the home sidebar are now white.
The topbar in the mobile version of Learn is now dark.
Borders in the home sidebar are now dark.
The Gravity icon no longer has a dark background.

Version 1.6.5
Removed white borders in search.
Tags in search are now readable.
User profiles in search are now readable.
Classes in search are now readable.

Version 1.6.4
The Create folder box is now dark.
Class join requests are now dark.
(Also apparently some updates were removed or something, I don't know why.)

Version 1.6
Fixed some white borders.
Suggestions when making a set are now dark.
The Careers page is now fully dark.
The Testimonials page is fully dark.
The new Help Center is now dark.

Version 1.5.4
Set pages are fully dark again.
Updated credits at the bottom of pages.
Buttons on Flashcards are now dark and have white icons.
All links in the header are white again.
Fixed the slightly off-colored background.

Version 1.5.3
Flashcards in Learn are now dark.
Removed white boxes on a teacher's set.
Some buttons in Match and Gravity are now the right color.

Version 1.5.2
The Nice work! box after finishing flashcards is now dark.
Results at the end of Spell are now dark. 
Fixed the big white borders around results in Learn. Thanks to Bot Raid for telling me about this problem!
Most of the white borders are now dark.
Text on flashcards on a set's page is now white. (4th time I had to fix this, hopefully it will stay like this.)
Selection boxes on a set's page now have white text.
The background of some elements was slightly different than normal, this is now fixed.
Updated description.
Thanks for 100 installs by the way!

Version 1.5.1
Most ads should be invisible if you're not using an adblocker.
Updated the new set page with the Dark Theme.
Small fixes in Learn.

Version 1.5
The background on the logged-out homepage is now fully dark.
The 'Introducing Quizlet Premium Content' box on the logged-out homepage is now dark.
The 'Make the prefect study set' box is now dark.
More text on the Search page is white.
Text on cards on a set's page is now white. (This is like the third time I had to fix this.)
More buttons are now dark.
Shortcut lists don't have white borders anymore.
The lightbulb icon is now that same color as buttons.
All text of the delete pop-up is now white.
Studied sets are now fully dark.
The Quizlet logo, create button, and username are now white on the Help, Privacy, Blog, etc. pages.
The Honor Code, Guidelines, Students, Terms of Service and Testimonials pages is now dark.
More stuff on the Premium Content page is dark.
The checkout box is now fully dark.
Style image updated so it fits nicer on the website.


Version 1.4.2
Names of people on the new homepage are now white.
Icons in the menu on the left are now the same color as buttons.
The version number on the preview is now gone, because I'm too lazy too update it.

Version 1.4.1
The Goodbye page is now dark.
The Sign-up screen is now dark.
The homepage when you're logged out is now fully dark.
Credits for this theme added after Quizlet Copyright at the bottom of the page, because why not.

Version 1.4
Print and Combine Set pages are now dark.
All text in the 'Export' box is now white.
'Long-Term Learning' box and pop-up are now fully dark.
The Mission, Blog, Jobs, Mobile, Quizlet Learn, Diagrams, Teachers, and Press pages are now dark.
The 'Continue learning' box is now dark.
Some more text in 'Embed' is white.
The 'Info' popup of a set is now fully dark.
'Top scores' popup is now fully dark.
Icons next to the term of a set now have the same colors as buttons.
Facebook and Twitter buttons now have blue borders like normal buttons.

Version 1.3
Text boxes now have the same color as the background.
The Help Center and Privacy Policy are now dark.
Added version number in the name of the style.
Changed main screenshot of the style.

Version 1.2.1
The special characters box on the Create Set page is now dark.
The text in the Shortcuts pop-up is now white.
Cards on the set viewing page now have white text.

Version 1.2
The Premium Content page is now dark.
Text that was dark blue is now the same color as buttons to match the real dark theme.
More text on the Settings page is now white.
The special characters boxes are now dark.
Small fixes in Learn.

Version 1.1
Text in text boxes are now white.
When adding a set to a folder or class, the background is now dark.
Share on Twitter and Facebook buttons after you've made a set are now dark. 
Some more text on the set page is white.

Version 1.0
Initial release.

discussions.name: Weird white boxes around final round overview
